text: The Mad Game is a 1933 American crime drama movie directed by Irving Cummings and starring Spencer Tracy, Claire Trevor, Ralph Morgan, J. Carrol Naish, Matt McHugh, Kathleen Burke, Willard Robertson. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1933 drama movies Category:1930s American crime drama movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by Irving Cummings
title: The Mad Game
